content: Great app but.. The purchased app will not work with my phone so I had to refund

Search function needed. Inside individual categories you can search. But to find a term, I have to find which category it might be in. Looking for the sign for "today", no time category....so maybe doesn't exist or is part of another category. A simple search would make this app easy to use. Otherwise it is actually more difficult to use than to just Google my request.
It doesnt run smoothly on my new phone because it's says the app isnt up to date but there are no updates for it

I love the videos, they are easy to understand. My toddler also enjoys watching them as we learn new signs. I just wish there were more signs relevant to us - I've gone to look up a few to teach my toddler and they're not included (coffee, pizza, etc). Other than that, we love it!
This app is amazing and I love it. However, some of the videos don't show the whole sign since it only works in portrait. (Example: big)
Got 2 nonverbal kids (age 4 and 5). this helps. thanks so much
Nice, but needs an update to support newer model phones. The teachers are cut off on the edges of my S9+.

My first attempt /purchase of the dictionary did'nt install properly, which was disapointing because I had higher expectations based off other user reviews. I refunded it, downloaded the free app, and repurchased it through the free app. For whatever reason, it downloaded properly this way. So far, my baby and I are watching it together and loving it. The videos & explanations are easy, cute, & stick with you. I hope they develop a more comprehensive app for later child development.

this app is very educational, and very helpful! my daughter has unilateral hearing loss, and this app has really helped me in self-teaching myself and my family ASL. It obviously doesnt have it ALL, but helps me when I forget a word. I enjoy the video format and how they explain the sign. Def worth the buy if you're serious about learning the language.

A really good App to help my niece learn ASL! The images help her easily understand what the sign is for. Hoping for more improvements - some of the videos are zoomed in so much that we couldn't see the hand gestures (videos are in portrait - gestures that extend wider than the interpreter's shoulders are cut off by the screen's left and right edges). It'd be great if there's a Flashcard feature -- with bigger images for objects or an animated GIF for Verbs are shown with a Play Video Button.

I really like it. The explanations are good. The only down point is I can't always see the ladies hands. They are off the screen at times. Making it impossible to see. The mans are fine though. Update: found other programs with more words and more accurate signing. Some signs are nothing like ASL that I consistently see other places.

I really like this app. There are a lot of words, but I think there are a 
few that coukd be added to make it better. Words like, "hold", "carry", 
"come ".
good

Really like the app! The videos and added explanation of the sign help to make sure you interpret it correctly and understand the root of the sign which makes it easier to remember. Would like to see "don't pinch" added to the library!
Easy to use - easy to learn
This is the only ASL app my special needs children took to.

I paid for the upgraded version. I still can'ttype in a word that's not already offered. It took forever to download! I had to stay in the app to get it to download and it still crashed while downloading. Disappointed!

4 out of 5 only because there are a couple words that you can't see the sign because it's off the screen. Also, there are some signs that I personally think they should mention that this sign is the same as this other sign bit this is me really knit-picking is really a great app worth a lot of words!
I liked the free version But then had to dl and i tried almost an hour. Refund.
Been wanting to learn but only own nothing seemed to help. But this has and I'm so grateful!
IT WONT DOWNLOAD THE VIDEOS!! IT SAID THE READ HAS TIMED OUT WHAT DOES THAT MEAN?! If this bug doesn't fix soon I want my money back!!
The quiz answers are always one of the first 2 options and some of the quiz videos the signs are off the video, purple and towel for example.
Not enough signs for my grandkids. They have alredy out grown the app :-(
I'm totally disappointed, I can't open the app! There is a message saying that the app is not licensed for Google Play, but I just bought it from Google Play!!

I went thru a ton of apps and websites before installing this and I love it! The tutorial videos make remembering the signs easy peasy and only took 5 mins to download the content.  I only wish I'd started teaching my 15 mo old earlier bc now he just laughs at me when I try to teach him some signs, but I enjoy it for myself nonetheless :)
I always find myself looking for words that are not on the list and I end up having to look for said word online.

Best features:no internet needed, allows for better load time, saving money, no service needed. Teachers explain how & why signs are done a certain way, & even tricks to remember words. My son learned all the words in just a month or two, as did I. Only complaint is I want both of us to be fluent, they can add words or make an advanced app offering more words. My other ASL app offers 5,200 signs vs this app offers maybe 347 that's a massive difference; take  time & effort to expand vocabulary it'll pay off
It REALLY SUCKS,,!!!!..waiting 1&1/2 , day,,..4 app to download..
I researched many similar apps, and this is the best!  We're using it to teach the adults in the babies' lives (mom, dad, grandparents, etc.) NOT the babies (twins).
Great app fantastic everything I need to know to start !!!!

I love most of this app and use it a ton for our daughter, who is experiencing some hearing loss, BUT we need more words!  A section on body parts, instructions such as listen, use your words, obey or ways to respond to the child such as "I hear you" "I see you" etc.

Bought this app and tried to download the videos but I keep getting an error message telling me to correct my date/time/time zone in my settings before I can download but these are all correct! Very frustrating as I love the lite version and wanted more words. Waste of money.
My son enjoy it and it help his dad to understand when he signs
The videos load quickly, the instructions are easy to understand. Our 4 year old grand daughter speaks very well but she wants to teach her baby brother to talk to her and this works.

My very first purchase for 2015. A whopping 2€ - and also the very first app that I have ever purchased. I initially got the lite version but it blew me away so much that I bought the full version within 10 minutes. Now my husband can learn a lot faster.... and hopefully he can look for signs that are not just gross. Seriously awesome app, which I have installed on both the Samsung  Galaxy 3 and the Samsung tablet 10.1.
Has videos and explanation on when and how to use the signs!  Has a quiz to help you learn I've learnt 30 words in one night!  Just use the app while in bed is so easy!!
We are learning right along with my granddaughter who has downs. It is wonderful to see her communicate. She has more signs then words. Wonderful app
Great variety of the signs and very easy videos to learn from.

THIS TAKES 3 HRS TO LOAD CLIPS... DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY ON THIS JUNK... THE LITE VERSION WAS PERFECT BUT AFTER YOU BUY IT, IT IS CRAP... I GOT IT CAUSE WE RECENTLY FOUND MY 4 YR OLD TO BE DEAF AND I WANTED TO TEACH HER SIGN LANGUAGE OHHH HELL NO... NOT WITH THIS....
Great video and instructions could use more words but so worth the money
Love this app tried books but   this is the easiest way to lean n teach your child sign lenguage
Very informative but put together in a simple,easy way for both you and your baby to learn.
Fun to use!
I love the extra description of each sign, such as I love you is a combination of I, L, Y. It helps me remember them better!
So frusterating when you pay and it does not work. Free version better
I bought a new phone a better one but it still takes forever to load I mean why all the trouble? Please fix I would finally like to use what I paid for please fix uninstalling for now
replyContent: Hi, As the app is multimedia rich (340 tutorials) a good user experience depends on a decent quality WiFi connection and also ample memory to store the app. Fortunately once the initial download is complete there is no further requirement for an internet connection. If you would like a refund please contact us on the Baby Sign and Learn website.

content: On HTC Droid incredible 4g the downloading video clips restarts everytime the screen goes dark.
Both times i have uploaded this app and try to open it it says this app has unexpectedly stopped! Please try again! Wont be reinstalling at all!
Don't know why the bad reviews. The videos load fast and are great. Just wish I could pay to expand the content but looks limited to the 300 signs or so.

It looks like out should be great but the videos take up a huge amount of space on USB storage and I can't move them to AS card. And then once finally downloaded, videos don't play. I hear the sound but video is just a black screen. Very annoying.
replyContent: Hi, I'm sorry you're having trouble with the app. I find that issues with the video are usually resolved by restarting the device. If you continue to have problems after the reboot, please contact Baby Sign and Learn Support http://www.babysignandlearn.com/contact-us and we will assist you.
